extensible-effectsã£ã¦ï¼Ÿ

ã€€MonadTransã®ãƒ¢ãƒŠãƒ‰ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ä»£æ›¿ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã§ã™ã€‚ ä¾‹ãˆã°ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã®Monadæ–‡è„ˆã‚’

f :: StateT Foo (ReaderT Bar IO) Int
f = return 10

ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«æ›¸ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚

f :: (Member (State Foo) r, Member (Reader Bar) r, SetMember Lift (Lift IO))
     => Eff r Int
f = return 10

ä½•ãŒå¬‰ã—ã„ã®ï¼Ÿ

ã€€MonadTransã®liftã®ç¹°ã‚Šè¿”ã—ç”±æ¥ã®ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ã‚„ liftã®ç¹°ã‚Šè¿”ã—ãŒãªããªã‚‹ãã†ã§ã™ã€‚

â€¦â€¦ãŒã€å¤§ä½“ã®ï¼ˆéæ±ºå®šçš„ãªï¼‰MonadTransã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãŒã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«ãªã£ã¦ãã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŠã‹ã’ã§

instance MonadState s m => MonadState s (MaybeT m)
instance MonadReader r m => MonadReader r (MaybeT m)

åƒ•ã¯å…¨ãliftã®ç¹°ã‚Šè¿”ã—ã‚’ã—ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ã„ã‘ãªã„äº‹æ…‹ã«ãªã£ãŸã“ã¨ãŒãªã„ã®ã§ã—ãŸ ğŸ•

ä¾‹ãˆã°ä¸Šã®UndecidableInstancesã¯ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã‚’å¯èƒ½ã«ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã€‚ï¼ˆliftIOãŒ1ã¤ã€ãã‚‰ã„ã—ã‹ãªã„ï¼‰

{-# LANGUAGE GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving #-}

import Control.Applicative (Alternative)
import Control.Arrow ((>>>))
import Control.Monad (MonadPlus, mzero)
import Control.Monad.IO.Class (MonadIO, liftIO)
import Control.Monad.Reader (MonadReader, ReaderT, runReaderT, ask)
import Control.Monad.State.Lazy (MonadState, StateT, runStateT, get, put)
import Control.Monad.Trans.Maybe (MaybeT, runMaybeT)

data MyState = MyState
  { foo :: Int
  } deriving (Show)

initialMyState :: MyState
initialMyState = MyState 10

data MyROM = MyROM
  { bar :: Int
  } deriving (Show)

defaultMyROM = MyROM 20

newtype Mine a = Mine
  { _runMine :: MaybeT (StateT MyState (ReaderT MyROM IO)) a
  } deriving ( Functor, Applicative, Monad
             , Alternative, MonadPlus
             , MonadState MyState
             , MonadReader MyROM
             , MonadIO
             )

runMine :: Mine a -> IO (Maybe a, MyState)
runMine = _runMine
            >>> runMaybeT
            >>> flip runStateT initialMyState
            >>> flip runReaderT defaultMyROM

k :: Mine ()
k = do
  MyState foo' <- get
  MyROM bar'   <- ask
  let result = foo' + bar'
  put $ MyState result
  liftIO $ print result
  mzero -- Mine's mzero is MaybeT's Nothing

main :: IO ()
main = do
  (result, s) <- runMine k
  print s
  print result
--- vvv output vvv
-- 30
-- MyState {foo = 30}
-- Nothing

ãŠã£ã¨ã€effã®è©±ã ã£ãŸ ğŸ˜†

ã¯ã„ã€effã¯ãƒ¢ãƒŠãƒ‰ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒã‚ˆã‚Šã‚‚ãƒ‘ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ã‚¹ãŒã„ã„ã‚‰ã—ã„ï¼Ÿ ã—ã€é¢ç™½ãã†ãªã®ã§ã‚„ã£ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚

ãã®1

ã€€ã¾ãšFlexibleContextsã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ãã®2 - å‹åˆ¶ç´„Member m rã§mã‚’æ–‡è„ˆã«å¼•ãè¾¼ã‚€

ã€€Effã‚’ä½¿ã†æ™‚ã¯ã€å¤šåˆ†åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«é–¢æ•°ã®å‹ã¯ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã®å½¢ã‚’ã—ã¦ã¾ã™ã€‚

effContext :: (Member (State Foo) r, Member (Reader Bar) r) => Eff r a

ã“ã®é–¢æ•°ã®å‹åˆ¶ç´„(Member (State Foo) r, Member (Reader Bar) r)ã¯ State Fooã¨Reader Barã‚’Eff rã§ä½¿ãˆã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

ä¾‹ãˆã°ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜

effContext' :: (Member (State Int) r, Member (Reader Char) r) => Eff r Int
effContext' = do
  x <- ask
  y <- get
  let result = ord x + y
  put result
  return result

liftç„¡ã—ã§askã‚‚getã‚‚ä½¿ãˆã¦ã¾ã™ â— â—

ãã®3 - å…·ä½“å‹

ã€€ã¨ã“ã‚ã§ã•ã£ãã®effContext'ã€ã“ã†ã‚„ã£ã¦ã„ãŸã„ã‚“ã§ã™ãŒ

main :: IO ()
main = do
  let x = run . runState 10 $ runReader effContext' 'a'
  print x

effç‹¬ç‰¹ã®ã‚„ã°ã¿ã®ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒå‡ºã‚‹ã®ã§ã€å‹ä»˜ã‘ã—ã¦ã‚ã’ã¾ã™ã€‚

main :: IO ()
main = do
  let x = run . runState 10
          $ flip runReader 'a' (effContext' :: Eff (Reader Char :> State Int :> Void) Int)
  print x
-- vvv output vvv
-- (107,107)

ã€€Eff (Reader Char :> State Int :> Void) Intã¨ã„ã†å‹ãŒè¦‹ã¦ã¨ã‚Œã‚‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ãŒã€ã“ã‚Œã¯runReader, runState, runã¨é€£å‹•ã—ã¦ã„ã¦ã€

runReader ::    Eff (Reader Char :> State Int :> Void) Int -> Char
             -> Eff (               State Int :> Void) Int
runState  :: Int -> Eff (State Int :> Void) Int
                 -> Eff (             Void) Int
run :: Eff Void Int -> Int

ã¨ã„ã†æ„Ÿã˜ã§ã€runFooã¯a :> b :> .. :> Voidã®aï¼ˆä¸€ç•ªå·¦ï¼‰ã‚’å¼•ã£ãºãŒã™å½¹å‰²ã‚Šã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ ğŸ‘
ã¾ã‚Effã®a :> b :> .. :> vã£ã¦å¹½éœŠå‹ã‚‰ã—ã„ã‚“ã§ã™ã‘ã©ã­ã€‚ ã™ã’ãˆãˆã€‚

ãã—ã¦run :: Eff Void (Int, Int) -> (Int, Int)ãŒEff Voidã‚’å¼•ã£ãºãŒã—ã¦ã€é€šå¸¸ã®ä¸–ç•Œã«æˆ»ã£ã¦ãã¾ã™ã€‚

ã€€ã“ã“ã¾ã§ã®ã¾ã¨ã‚ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã™ã€‚

{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleContexts #-}
{-# LANGUAGE TypeOperators #-}

import Control.Eff (Member, Eff, (:>), run)
import Control.Eff.Reader.Lazy (Reader, ask, runReader)
import Control.Eff.State.Lazy (State, get, put, runState)
import Data.Char (ord)
import Data.Void (Void)

effContext' :: (Member (State Int) r, Member (Reader Char) r) => Eff r Int
effContext' = do
  x <- ask
  y <- get
  let result = ord x + y
  put result
  return result


main :: IO ()
main = do
  let x = run -- run :: Eff Void (Int, Int) -> (Int, Int)
          . runState 10
          $ flip runReader 'a' -- runReader :: Eff (Reader Char :> State Int :> Void) Int -> Char -> Eff (State Int :> Void) Int
              (effContext' :: Eff (Reader Char :> State Int :> Void) Int)
  print x

ãã®3.5 - ã‚ã‚“ã©ã„Writer

ã€€å®Ÿã¯effã®State, Reader ãã—ã¦ Writerã¯ã€effã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ç‹¬è‡ªã«å®šç¾©ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚“ã§ã™ã‚ˆã­ã€‚ ãã—ã¦WriterãŒMonoid w => MonadWriter w (Writer w)ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ãªãã£ã¦ã€Monoidå‘¨ã‚ŠãŒã™ã”ãã‚ã‚“ã©ããªã£ã¦ã‚‹ã€‚ ï¼ˆã„ã¤ã‚‚ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«runWriterã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã˜ã‚ƒè¶³ã‚Šãªã„ï¼‰

å‹ã‚’è¦‹ã‚‹ã¨ã™ã”ãã¦ã€ãªã‚“ã‹é–¢æ•°ã¨åˆæœŸå€¤ã‚’å¼•æ•°ã«è¦æ±‚ã•ã‚Œã¦ã‚‹ã€‚

-- (w -> b -> b)
-- b
runWriter :: Typeable w => (w -> b -> b) -> b -> Eff (Writer w :> r) a -> Eff r (b, a)

ã©ã†ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã¨ã„ã†ã¨ã€ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«ã‚„ã£ã¦ã‚ã’ã‚‹ã‹

effWriterContext :: Member (Writer [String]) r => Eff r ()
effWriterContext = do
  tell ["wakaba"]
  tell ["hinata"]
main :: IO ()
main = do
  let x = run $ runWriter (++) [] (effWriterContext :: Eff (Writer [String] :> Void) ())
  print x
-- vvv output vvv
-- (["wakaba","hinata"],())

runMonoidWriterã¨ã„ã†è£œåŠ©é–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã‚ã’ã¾ã™ã€‚

main :: IO ()
main = do
  let x = run $ runMonoidWriter (effWriterContext :: Eff (Writer [String] :> Void) ())
  print x

ã¾ã¨ã‚ã€‚

{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleContexts #-}
{-# LANGUAGE TypeOperators #-}

import Control.Eff (Member, Eff, (:>), run)
import Control.Eff.Writer.Lazy (Writer, tell, runWriter, runMonoidWriter)
import Data.Void (Void)

effWriterContext :: Member (Writer [String]) r => Eff r ()
effWriterContext = do
  tell ["wakaba"]
  tell ["hinata"]

main :: IO ()
main = do
  --let x = run $ runWriter (++) [] (effWriterContext :: Eff (Writer [String] :> Void) ())
  let x = run $ runMonoidWriter (effWriterContext :: Eff (Writer [String] :> Void) ())
  print x

ãã®3.7 - ãƒã‚¬ã‚¦

ã€€ã‚‚ã†æ°—ã¥ã‹ã‚ŒãŸã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ãŒã€æˆ‘ã€…ã®çŸ¥ã‚‹runStateã¨ã¯å¼•æ•°ã®é †åºãŒé•ã†ã‚“ã§ã™ã‚ˆã­ã€‚ ãƒŠãƒ³ãƒ‡ï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€Œs -> (a, s)ã®æŠ½è±¡ã€ã¨ã„ã†å½¹å‰²ã‚’é›¢ã‚ŒãŸã‹ã‚‰ï¼ï¼Ÿ

ãã®4 - IOã¨ã‹

ã€€ã¨ã“ã‚ã§Member t rã®tã«ã¯ã€æˆ‘ã€…ã®ã‚ˆãè¦ªã—ã‚“ã IOã‚„Maybeã¯è¨­å®šã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ runIOã‚„runMaybeãŒeffã«ãªã„ã®ã§ ğŸ˜¢

ã€€ãã“ã§SetMemberã¨ã„ã†ã€(:>)ã®é€£é–ã®ä¸­ã®ã€å”¯ä¸€ã®Lift mã‚’è§£å‡ã§ãã‚‹å‹ã§ã€ãã‚Œã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¦ã‚ã’ã¾ã™ã€‚ Lift mã¯runLiftã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã€(:>)ã®é€£é–ã®ä¸­ã«1ã¤ã ã‘è¨±ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ ï¼ˆLift IO :> Lift Maybe :> Voidã¨ã‹ã¯ã ã‚ã§ã€Lift IO :> Voidã¯è‰¯ã„ï¼‰

ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã€‚

{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleContexts #-}
{-# LANGUAGE TypeOperators #-}

import Control.Eff (Member, SetMember, Eff, (:>))
import Control.Eff.Lift (Lift, lift, runLift)
import Control.Eff.Reader.Lazy (Reader, ask, runReader)
import Control.Eff.State.Lazy (State, get, put, runState)
import Control.Eff.Writer.Lazy (Writer, tell, runWriter, runMonoidWriter)
import Data.Char (ord)
import Data.Void (Void)

effContext'' :: ( Member (Writer [String]) r
                , SetMember Lift (Lift IO) r
                ) => Eff r ()
effContext'' = do
  input <- lift getLine
  tell [input]
  return ()


main :: IO ()
main = do
  x <- runLift $ runMonoidWriter (effContext'' :: Eff (Writer [String] :> Lift IO :> Void) ())
  print x
-- vvv input vvv
-- aaa
-- vvv output vvv
-- (["aaa"],())

ä»¥ä¸Šã€é€²æ—ã§ã—ãŸã€‚

ã¨ã“ã‚ã§

ã€€MaybeT IO aã¿ãŸã„ãªã‚‚ã®ã‚’ä½¿ã„ãŸã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ã€ã©ã†ã™ã‚Œã°ã„ã„ã‚“ã ã‚ã†ã€‚ ã‚‚ã†ã„ã£ãSetMember Lift (Lift IO) r => MaybeT (Eff r) aä½¿ã£ã¡ã‚ƒã†ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ ğŸ˜†

å‚è€ƒãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸
